  3. cache-container
  4. cache
  5. component=transaction

The cache transaction configuration.

Runtime only resource This resource is runtime only and doesn't have any persistent configuration.

Attributes (3)

  • commits The number of transaction commits.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
  • prepares The number of transaction prepares.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
  • rollbacks The number of transaction rollbacks.
    • Attribute Value
    Type LONG
    Nillable false
    Expressions Allowed false
    Storage runtime
    Access Type metric
